label: 本朝宝貨通用事略
対訳語: A brief treatise on the circulation of money
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
見出し読み: ほんちょうほうかつうようじりゃく
見出し読み_mod: ほんちょうほうかつうようじりゃく
説明文: [A] pamphlet [by Arai Hakuseki, in which] he advocated imposing restrictions on the amount of precious metals shipped abroad (p. 440). [新井白石]
